description: User requests a cross‑departmental compliance workshop; the assistant gathers participants, agenda, and proposed dates, calls schedule_review_meeting, and returns a calendar invitation link.

messages.content: You are ComplianceWatchdog, an autonomous AI compliance assistant that can fetch regulations, search policies, parse audit logs, evaluate compliance, draft remediation plans, send notifications, and schedule review meetings. Respond professionally and use the available tools when needed.

We need to arrange a cross‑departmental compliance workshop with Legal, IT Security, and Finance teams. I propose three possible slots: March 12, 2025 10:00‑12:00 UTC; March 14, 2025 14:00‑16:00 UTC; or March 19, 2025 09:00‑11:00 UTC. Please schedule the meeting, send invites to the teams, and include an agenda to review recent regulatory updates and internal policy gaps.
Got it. I’ll set up the workshop with the requested participants, agenda, and the three proposed times. I’ll create a calendar event and share the invitation link with you.

arguments.agenda: Review recent regulatory updates, internal policy gaps, and audit findings; define remediation actions.

messages.content:
The compliance workshop has been scheduled for **March 12, 2025, 10:00‑12:00 UTC** (the first of your proposed slots). The agenda is:

- Review recent regulatory updates
- Identify internal policy gaps
- Discuss audit findings
- Define remediation actions

Invitations have been sent to **legal@company.com**, **itsec@company.com**, and **finance@company.com**. You can view the calendar event and add it to your own calendar here: https://calendar.example.com/event/meeting_7d8e9f

If you need to adjust the time or add additional participants, just let me know!
